title: Popular Male Singer Caught Spending The Night With Female Star After Relationship Denial
desc: A popular male singer was recently spotted spending the night with a female star, rekindling dating rumors that have existed for years.

title: It was only a dog, say parents of dog-killer boys
desc: A HORRIFYING case of animal cruelty involving two young boys and fireworks in China's Jiangsu province shocked social media users in the country, Sin Chew Daily reported.

title: Ireland must 'stop rot' after Paris humbling
desc: Ireland's heavy defeat by France to open the Six Nations will only further press questions raised by a lacklustre autumn.

title: Cristiano Ronaldo: End in sight after fallout with Saudi Pro League
desc: When Cristiano Ronaldo announced that he was going to play in the Saudi Pro League, it's safe to say that eyebrows were raised in the world of football.

title: Reddit Bets AI Search Will Be Its Next Revenue Goldmine
desc: Reddit reveals AI-powered search surged to 15M users, positioning it as major monetization play

title: Driver forced from car in Vancouver carjacking that left it flipped on its roof
desc: A suspect is in hospital and police custody after an alleged carjacking in Vancouver that left the car flipped on its roof.

title: Trump promises Schumer funding for NY tunnel project - if Penn Station and Dulles Airport are renamed after him
desc: President Donald Trump told Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer last month that he was finally prepared to drop his freeze on billions of dollars in funding for a major New York infrastructure project.

title: Diplomacy or dagger? US pushes Iran to talks as warships close in on Gulf
desc: The US and Iran have agreed to hold talks in Oman on Friday, officials said, despite differences over Washington’s push to include Iran’s missile programme and Tehran’s demand to limit discussions to nuclear issues.

title: Beyond the Songs Inside: After the applause
desc: Creative prison programs are celebrated for their ability to heal and transform incarcerated people. But are they enough to break the cycle?

title: Baby Giants Were The Fast Food of The Jurassic, Study Reveals
desc: Baby long-necked dinosaurs might have been the fast food of the Jurassic Period.
